title: Sustainable Development Education Strategy Design for SDGs Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic social education and exposure to workplace sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: Strategic learning for internalizing SDGs values in digital device-enabled online environments.

learning_goals: Learners can create conceptual maps illustrating the interconnections among the 17 SDGs.
Learners can design and implement three media-based strategies for promoting SDGs in workplace settings.
Learners can develop strategies to encourage participation in SDGs practice campaigns utilizing digital platforms
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
